definition: A term referring to the act of providing assistance or service to customers or clients, typically in a professional setting such as a restaurant, hotel, or shop. It involves attending to their needs, taking orders, delivering items, and ensuring overall customer satisfaction.

examples.german: Die Bedienung im Restaurant war sehr freundlich.
examples.english: The service in the restaurant was very friendly.

examples.german: Die Bedienung des neuen Smartphones ist sehr einfach.
examples.english: The operation of the new smartphone is very easy.

examples.german: Die Bedienung der Maschine erfordert spezielle Kenntnisse.
examples.english: Operating the machine requires special knowledge.

examples.german: Die Bedienung des Fernsehers ist über die Fernbedienung möglich.
examples.english: The television can be operated using the remote control.

examples.german: Die Bedienung des Computersystems ist intuitiv.
examples.english: The operation of the computer system is intuitive.
